error.signature: TS2669: Augmentations for the global scope can only be directly nested in external modules or ambient module declarations

verdict.summary: Module augmentation syntax is incorrect. The file must be a module (have import/export) and use the correct declaration merging syntax.

dead_ends.action: Put augmentation declarations in a non-module script file
dead_ends.why_fails: Module augmentations only work inside modules (files with import/export statements)

workarounds.action: Ensure the file is a module and use proper augmentation syntax
Use declare global for global scope augmentations

leads_to.condition: When augmentation leads to namespace merging conflicts

preceded_by.condition: When adding custom properties to existing types

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Namespace merging is about combining declarations; module augmentation is about extending external modules
